enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
section_title: IPCC GUIDELINES FOR NATIONAL GREENHOUSE GAS INVENTORIES:
sentences: During informal consultations, parties accepted text noting the importance of continuous improvement of greenhouse gas inventories and paragraphs regarding harvested wood products.
Parties agreed to delete a paragraph referring to the 2008 IPCC workshop on the IPCC 2006 guidelines.
Regarding methodological issues, delegates compromised by agreeing to recognize that there are methodological issues, without highlighting specifics.
In the final contact group session in the afternoon, the revised text was approved with minor editorial changes.
